description: The School Dean and Konoka`s grandfather, which likely played a role in his decision for Negi to live with his granddaughter and Asuna. What has been indicated is that he is a kind-hearted man, but extremely strict. He is also the chief of the Kantou Magic Association. The Dean`s hobby is arranging omiai for Konoka to choose a future fianc√©e, despite Konoka not wanting to. He even offered the position to Negi.
name: Konoe Konoemon
